Description: Extended plain weave fragment of a belt, in undyed linen with two red lines (c. 6mm in from the edges); the two simple seledges are preserved, one end is ragged and the other remains and the warp threads are kept together and wrapped with red linen threads, on 3 cm, to create a tassle (c.4.5cm long); extended plain weave: warp-undyed and red linen (S/paired/7), weft-undyed linen (S/paired/5); red threads at tassle the same as in the warp
